trans-unit.source: Specifies load options when parsing XML.
trans-unit.target: 指定剖析 XML 時的載入選項。

trans-unit.source: If you preserve white space when loading, all insignificant white space in the XML tree is materialized in the XML tree as is.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在載入時保留空白字元，請在 XML 樹狀結構中的所有有效空白字元會具體化因為是在 XML 樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: If you do not preserve white space, then all insignificant white space is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果不保留空白字元，會捨棄所有有效空白字元。

trans-unit.source: There is a performance penalty if you set the SetBaseUri and the SetLineInfo flags.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定 SetBaseUri 和 SetLineInfo 旗標，會對效能帶來負面影響。

trans-unit.source: The base URI and the line information are accurate immediately after loading the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 基底 URI 與行資訊正確後立即載入 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the base URI and line information may become meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 如果您修改 XML 樹狀結構之後載入文件，基底 URI 和行資訊可能會沒有意義。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> does not have base URI or line information, setting the SetBaseUri and the SetLineInfo flags will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>沒有基底 URI 或一行資訊，不設定 SetBaseUri 和 SetLineInfo 旗標將會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This type allows you to control how LINQ to XML handles white space when loading or parsing.
trans-unit.target: 此類型可讓您控制 LINQ to XML 處理空白字元時載入或剖析的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)和[保留泛空白字元時序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。

trans-unit.source: This example loads a small XML tree from a file, setting the options to set base URI and retain line information.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會載入小型 XML 樹狀從檔案、 設定選項來設定基底 URI，並保留行資訊。

trans-unit.source: It then adds another element that does not have line information.
trans-unit.target: 接著，它會加入另一個項目，但是沒有行資訊。

trans-unit.source: It then prints the line information for each element in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 接著，它會列印每個項目樹狀目錄中的行資訊。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會產生下列輸出：

trans-unit.source: Does not preserve insignificant white space or load base URI and line information.
trans-unit.target: 請勿保留不重要的泛空白字元，或載入基底 URI 和行資訊。

trans-unit.source: Preserves insignificant white space while parsing.
trans-unit.target: 在剖析時保留不重要的泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Requests the base URI information from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />, and makes it available via the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.BaseUri" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 要求基底 URI 資訊，並使其可以透過 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.BaseUri" /> 屬性使用。

trans-unit.source: Requests the line information from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> and makes it available via properties on <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 要求行資訊，並使其可以透過 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XObject" /> 的屬性使用。
